text: @JoeBiden HHS Alex Azar said the reason for the high death in our country from COVID-19 is “we are unhealthy.” If this is true, than, the importance needs to be in prevention of obesity, diabetics, heart disease and other illnesses that can be controlled by common scense. #StaySafe   #Vote
